    • getPrintableFriendships

      public Iterable<String> getPrintableFriendships()
      Each friendship is made into a string having the format friend1(ID1) - friends2(ID2)
      Returns:
      The list of frinedships, as strings

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String password)
      Adds a new user
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the user
      lastName - the last name of the user
      email - the email of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if there is a user with the same email

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(Long userId)
      Deletes a user (and the friendships related to them)
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user
      Throws:
      InvalidDataProvidedException - if the id does not exist

    • addFriend

      public void addFriend(Long userId, Long newFriendId)
      Creates a friendship between two users
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the first user
      newFriendId - the id of the second user
      Throws:
      FriendshipAlreadyExistsException - if the two users are already friends

    • removeFriend

      public void removeFriend(Long userId, Long oldFriendId)
      Deletes the friendship between two users
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the first user
      oldFriendId - the id of the second user

      public List<User> biggestCommunity()
      Finds the most sociable community
      Returns:
      the community with the most members
